predicate.note: Frames file for 'redefine' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entries 29.2 48.1.2, other framed members include count, desribe, employ, intend, portray, regard, treat; arise, assert, declare, emerge, exude, materialize. Comparison with 'regard'.

example.name: all args
example.text: ...its cash flow, which the company defined *trace* as earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization.
